abstract: Pak Sung-Hyok (Hanja: 朴成赫,Korean: 박상혁, born 30 May 1990) is a North Korean international football player. He plays for Sobaeksu in the DPR Korea League.He has played on three occasions for the North Korean national team He was named to the 23-man North Korean squad for the 2010 FIFA World Cup.
